product_name: LOOPSHyper Eyes Dark Circles Eye Mask 5 Piece Set
summary: SummaryHyper Eyes Dark Circles Eye Mask 5 Piece Set is LOOPS targeted solution to help treat and reverse the appearance of dark circles, puffiness, and fine lines while visibly brightening the undereye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsLike a power nap for tired eyes, this rejuvenating treatment helps brighten, firm, and depuff the undereye area in just 10 minutesFormulated without: Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates, Synthetic Fragrances, Drying Alcohol, Mineral OilFeaturesInnovative hydrogel technology allows the mask to adhere to your skin, while simultaneously helping LOOPS ingredients absorb more effectively. LOOPS masks won't slip or drip, because your face care routine shouldn't have to slow you down95% of participants said Hyper Eyes agreed this product effectively reduces dark circles100% of participants said Hyper Eyes nourishes and revitalizes the under eye area88% of participants said Hyper Eyes helps smooth fine lines and wrinklesKey IngredientsTranexamic Acid - softens appearance of dark circlesBrightening Complex - boosts luminosityItem 2639031How To UseThe Moment It's For: After late nights or long days, or whenever you need to quickly brighten and depuff your undereye area. Use for 10 minutes, 2-3 times a week for best results.Clean & dry your skinApply textured side on under eye areaLeave on for a loop (10 min)Tap remaining serum into skinShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Perfect for under eye bags!
reviews.comments: i LOVEE this genuinely so much. I use this in the morning before i do my full base of makeup. I only leave on for about 10-15 mins. Please take this from someone who is 20, works all the time, is stressed and tired 24/7. I mainly got these for my upcoming beach events because i want to wear as minimal makeup as i can, and i plan on only using a very light color corrector on my undereyes right after i take these off instead of a full on beat. These honestly have changed my life i love them so much i am going to be buying way more of these and looking into other products that LOOPS has available here online.

reviews.headline: Would buy again!
reviews.comments: brightened my under eye area dramatically! will be buying again!
